_sText:
Title: awp_arena_v2
Author: Seraphim + Funky Chicken

This map is a remake of the orignal awp_arena for source, it's follows the same basic gameplay and map theme, but with improved visuals:

- Viewing windows have been added, as in a real arena.
- Models are no longer black as lighting has been introduced.
- Spawn points edited so enemies can not be shot at the very beginning of the round (views blocked by additional boxes)
- Some boxes can be destroyed.
- Coridoors added above ground level that can be accessed on low grav (sv_gravity 100 approx.)

Note: This map is not made by the original awp_arena mapper.

Enjoy this map, can be distributed as you wish but please do not take credit.
